inclusion.criterion: Patient diagnosed with chronic persistent asthma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have given written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of upper upper/lower respiratory infection in the previous 1 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of long-term controller medication use for asthma (oral corticosteroid or intravenous corticosteroids therapy) within the preceding 1 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of antibiotic use in the previous 1 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has asthma diagnosed a year ago and is currently experiencing symptoms. He was admitted to the emergency department with a diagnosis of severe asthma exacerbation.
